plot outline: A young boy Mahesh assumes the identity of Sameer just to get into his dream college to fulfill his aspiration of studying. However, this game of hiding his identity doesn't last very long and he finds himself amidst a murder mystery while trying to save his identity.
title: Joothanu?
plot: A young boy Mahesh assumes the identity of Sameer just to get into his dream college to fulfill his aspiration of studying. However, this game of hiding his identity doesn't last very long and he finds himself amidst a murder mystery while trying to save his identity.
